actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey certain lands originally acquired for the Garrison Dam and Reservoir project in the State of North Dakota to the Mountrail County Park Commission, Mountrail County, North Dakota.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to convey specified lands originally acquired for the Garrison Dam and Reservior project in the State of North Dakota to the Mountrail County Park Commission, Mountrail County, North Dakota. Provides that such lands shall be used solely for public park and recreational purposes.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey certain lands originally acquired for the Garrison Dam and Reservoir project in the State of North Dakota to the Mountrail County Park Commission, Mountrail County, North Dakota.
